feed.title: Great Ouse Ways
feed.subtitle: A personal guide to exploring the Great Ouse

entry.title: Big Stowe BioBlitz 2025
entry.content:
The annual BioBlitz at Stowe is taking place on 28th June at Stowe Gardens and you’re invited to join them looking at “all nature, from insects to trees to mammals to fungi to wildflowers to reptiles”.

Meet at the New Inn Visitor Centre anytime between 10 am and 4:30pm.

BioBlitz details
entry.summary: The annual BioBlitz at Stowe is taking place on 28th June at Stowe Gardens and you’re invited to join them looking at “all nature, from insects to trees to mammals to fungi to wildflowers to reptiles”.

entry.title: Ouse Valley Way Marathon
entry.content:
The annual Ouse Valley Way Marathon and Half Marathon will be on 21st September 2025 organised by the BRJ Run and Tri club.

The scenic route follows the Ouse Valley from Earith to Eynesbury, running along and near to the river on a mix of grass, gravel and tarmac paths.

BRJ details
entry.summary: The annual Ouse Valley Way Marathon and Half Marathon will be on 21st September 2025 organised by the BRJ Run and Tri club.
